:::Gigatron/The Skyscorchers:::

::They have a strange feeling, all of a sudden they realize that they're 
changing.  Gigatron is now a technorganic dragon, like TM2 Megatron, only 
more balanced.  Windrazor's structure is completely rearranged and becomes a 
technorganic Wolf/Eagle Fuzor.  Terradive's super structure gets completely 
changed to create a technorganic bat.  And Afterburner gets changed into a 
falcon::
Gigatron: Wow, i feel so powerful!
Windrazor: And balanced!
Terradive: I was made to be a bat!
Afterburner: Bird is my style!
::Gigatron turns to child::
Gigatron: Thank you child.  Now what is the plan?  Are we going to attempt 
the peace talks?
